Term.name: Term
Term.description: Represents a term or condition applied for a loan application or a collateral.

Description.description: The description for the term offered.

EffectiveFromDate.description: The effective start date of the term.

EffectiveToDate.description: The expiration date of the term.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the term offered is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the associated location was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the associated location was last viewed.

Subtype.description: Specifies the subtype of a term offered.

Type.description: Specifies the type of a term offered.
